participant_1.background:
I don't go to Comic Con, but I like to run and drink chai tea.
I am passionate about making music and expressing myself through it.
I am a gummy worm maker, and I love my job!
I've been enjoying my new hobbies of rock collecting and macaroni art.
I enjoy visiting the beach, but my favorite exotic place is the island of Bali.

participant_2.background:
I live in a city where the tall people are few and far between.
I've had to rescue people who were caught in riptides.
i am also a fulltime student studying radiology at local college.
i m pursuing my law degree.
i am a high school student.

content.text: Hi there! How is your day going?
Hey! It's going great, thanks for asking! How about yours?
It's going well! I'm just chilling, listening to some music.
Nice! What kind of music are you listening to?
I'm currently listening to some electronic music. I'm really into the genre right now.
Oh cool! I love electronic music too! What are some of your favorite artists?
I love Odesza, Flume, and Porter Robinson. They're all so talented.
I love those artists too! I'm also a big fan of Madeon and San Holo.
Oh nice! I haven't heard of San Holo before, but I'll definitely check them out.
Yeah, they're great! They have a really unique sound.
Cool! I'm always looking for new music to listen to.
Me too! Music is one of my favorite things to do.
Mine too! It's such a great way to relax and de-stress.
Exactly! I love just putting on some music and letting it take me away.
Me too! Music is the best.
